subject: PSYCH
title: Directed Studies - Social Science Advanced Psychology
description: The student will conduct an extensive literature review under the supervision of a faculty member. Course requirements will include writing a major essay/critique of a topic in a social science area of psychology. The course application form must include a detailed course plan including the method of evaluation. [Note: Normally students will take no more than three of PSYCH 480-486. Offered: F,W,S]
